long_description: With stylish leather uppers and solid construction, The Merrell Realm Chukka shoes are equally at home on campus, walking urban trails or hanging out at your favorite watering hole. Full-grain leather uppers hold up to everyday wear and tear. Smooth leather linings help feet slide into shoes, and offer all-day comfort and temperature regulation. Anatomic EVA footbeds offer cushioning for all-day wear. Air Cushion pods in the heels absorb shock throughout your stride. Molded nylon shanks support your arches, reducing foot fatigue. Merrell Realm Chukka shoes feature sticky rubber outsoles with 2mm lugs for reliable traction.
short_description: With stylish leather uppers and solid construction, The Merrell Realm Chukka shoes are equally at home on campus, walking urban trails or hanging out at your favorite watering hole.
